metadata.title: CVE-2016-2233 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the inbound_cap_ls function in common/inbound.c in HexChat 2.10.2 allows remote IRC servers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a large number of options in a CAP LS message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-2233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

hexchat - 2.12.4-1
hexchat-common - 2.12.4-1
hexchat-lua - 2.12.4-1
hexchat-perl - 2.12.4-1
hexchat-plugins - 2.12.4-1
hexchat-python3 - 2.12.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hexchat package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.4-1').
